frontmatter.title: Chatter
frontmatter.description: Chatter, a mobile application focused on mental health wellness, offers users opportunity to interact with an artificial intelligence chatbot.

frontmatter.title: Strategy Designer

frontmatter.title: Perpetua
frontmatter.description: Perpetua, a mobile banking and investment platform concept, incentivizes and rewards users to purchase sustainable products and invest in sustainable companies.
